attributes.action: hold a referendum in Great Britain to ascertain our views before amendments are made to the EU treaty at the June 2007 summit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister promised us a referendum on the EU constitution and he should not be permitted to wave through the proposed changes without seeking the views of all voters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
